body_html:
I have the same issue both with gcc 4.93 and 6.1.0. My work around was to replace line 20 of torch/lib/THD/master_worker/master/generic/THDTensor.cpp :
n += snprintf(str+n, L-n, "%" PRId64, tensor->size[i]);
with
n += snprintf(str+n, L-n, "%lld" , tensor->size[i]);
which appears to at least compile (with 6.1.0).
body:
I have the same issue both with gcc 4.93 and 6.1.0.  My work around was to replace line 20 of torch/lib/THD/master_worker/master/generic/THDTensor.cpp :
   `n += snprintf(str+n, L-n, "%" PRId64, tensor->size[i]);`
with
    `n += snprintf(str+n, L-n, "%lld" , tensor->size[i]);`
 which appears to at least compile (with 6.1.0).
